'''Poisonous Mushrooms''' (''unofficial name'') are a type of [[Tri-Lakshana Creature]] found in [[Sumeru]].

In their normal state, when approached, they will release a blast, dealing {{Color|AoE True Dendro DMG}} to both players and enemies. While Activated, a poisonous cloud will form around them, dealing {{Color|AoE True Dendro DoT}} at 0.5-second intervals to both players and enemies. While Scorched, they will not attack.

==Damage==
===Normal===
{{Environmental Damage|1.5|Normal State Blasts}}

===Activated===
{{Environmental Damage|0.4|Activated State DoT}}
